!Chuta Kaimu: The bravest of the Elrokian warriors, my master! My duty is to defend you from Sailren's claws, but you are wounded -- you fall! Your lifeless hand opens, and Gazkh falls to the ground, no longer a warrior's weapon. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 chutakaimu_q126_7.htm|The letters are reorganized.]
